short_summary: This tender was for a non-combatant procurement. Category 3 - Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets.
description: TSPSG Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C and covers a contract of the following Product Category(ies) of the SA: Product Category 3 – Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets.
full_summary:
```markdown
# Office Furniture Purchase Request

## Summary
The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is soliciting proposals for the purchase and delivery of office furniture, specifically Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets, by March 31, 2023.

## Background
This procurement is issued in accordance with the PSPC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C and is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO). The requirement is also open to suppliers who are not SA holders.

## Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical Competence
* Price
* Delivery Schedule

## Important Notes

* The procurement is a Request for Proposal (RFP) and not a tendering opportunity.
* Suppliers must hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) to submit a proposal.
* New suppliers can qualify for an SA by completing the process detailed in RFSA # E60PQ-140003/B.
* The contract is subject to the terms and conditions of the SA.

## Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
Daivya Aneja
Email: [Daivya.Aneja@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:Daivya.Aneja@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 571-4316

## Documents
The following documents are available for download:

* Questions and Responses (French-English)
* Workspaces Annex E (English)

Please refer to the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website for more information: [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders)

## Closing Date
The proposal submission deadline is February 16, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.
